title: YouTube’s Anti-Deepfake Tool Sparks Privacy Fears Over Biometric Tracking
description: YouTube is expanding its tracking tool, which detects AI deepfake videos. However, experts have warned creators against enrolling for it.
content: YouTube is expanding its tracking tool designed to help creators identify and remove AI deepfake videos that misuse their likeness. However, the feature has also raised concerns related to data priva… [+2137 chars]
